uib.teamdank.common

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uib.teamdank.common.GameObject
      • uib.teamdank.common.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Drunk, Pedestrian, Player, Player, Player, Player

    public class Actor
extends GameObject
    For a generic controlled actor in a game (e.g. a player or an NPC).

      • decreaseHealth

        public void decreaseHealth(int amount)
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of health to subtract

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Returns:
        how much health this actor currently has (if it is zero, the actor is dead)

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Returns:
        the maximum health this actor can have

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this actor

      • increaseHealth

        public void increaseHealth(int amount)
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of health to add

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(int health)
        Sets the health of this actor. It cannot be less than zero or larger than getMaxHealth().
        Parameters:
        health - the new health of this actor
